name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
description: When her 15-year-old son's cruel streak erupts into violence, his mother wonders how much blame she deserves for his actions..

reviews.title: About sums up feelings about Trump
reviews.body: I like the ideals of this movie
reviews.author: Barbara Sand
